item.title: 2020.07.09 patch notes (v97.01) | TERA KR
item.description: 1. July class balance Berserker Increased invicibility frame duration and reaction-resist duration from 1 second to 1.3 seconds upon using Titanic Shout Brawler Rampage Changed skill usage condition from Rage to MP, applied cooldown Changed to generate Rage per succesful hit, geenerates 500 Rage upon successfully targeting all hits Changed Haymaker - Resonance skill option Before Increased skill damage of nearby allies by 1.5% times for 8 seconds After Increase damage received by target by 2% for 10 seconds Added effect to Haymaker - Weak Spot Thrust Decrease skill cooldown of Flying Kick by 0.
